item.title: Audio controlled Shelly devices
item.author: zoltan.balogh@suse.com (l3mnt2010 Balogh)
item.description: The idea came from Tina Müller who was giving and awesome demo of the Vosk library. I quickly checked out the Alphacephei pages. I fundamentally like when a cool library has Python APIs. Vosk is an offline open source speech recognition toolkit. It enables speech recognition for lots of languages.
